pageContext.claim: “We're energy independent. We're the number one in the world. We're number one in the world.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. The United States continues to import millions of barrels of oil per day. “In 2018, the United States imported about 9.94 million barrels per day (MMb/d) of petroleum from nearly 90 countries,” according to an Energy Information Agency report, with 43 percent coming from Canada and 16 percent from Persian Gulf countries.
